summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5291 for the improvement of 29th Avenue South, from McClellan Street to a point 287 feet south thereof; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 61150, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
